title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 724.4 - Local permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 724.4 - Local permits

State Regulations
(a) Certain articles cannot be approved
department-wide because of programmatic and physical plant characteristics of
individual facilities. In order that those locations which can accommodate special
articles are not governed by those which cannot, each facility shall consider the
issuance of "local permits" in accordance with departmental directives. (1)

Repealed
(2)

Repealed
(3)

Repealed
(4)

Repealed
(5)

Repealed
(b) Each superintendent is required to maintain a
current list of all approved local permits. (1)

Repealed
(2)

Repealed
(3)

Repealed
(4)

Repealed

York State Register May 10, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 19, eff. 5/10/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
